comments.html: Can you put a test video up? I want to check if my iPad supports it :-)
comments.name: Ian

comments.html: Curious why no where does it mention if I can watch it later on my own time?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
Yes, you can watch a recording at any time. For webinars that have run in the past, you can watch the recordings even before the live session.

http://blog.ioshints.info/2010/11/early-access-to-webinar-recordings.html

Thanks for the feedback, will fix the post.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
